上では: (うえでは) - from the viewpoint of; according to
上には上がある: (うえにはうえがある) - (proverb) greatness is comparative; there is always someone better than you
上には上が有る: (うえにはうえがある) - (proverb) greatness is comparative; there is always someone better than you
上の人: (うえのひと) - superior/boss/higher-up; them (as opposed to "us"); person above/upstairs neighbour (neighbor)
上の句: (かみのく) - the first part of a poem or verse
上の級に進む: (うえのきゅうにすすむ) - to move up to a higher grade
上は: (うえは) - now that; since; as long as; provided that
上ばき: (うわばき) - hallway slippers; indoor shoes
上へ上へ: (うえへうえへ) - higher and higher
上べ: (うわべ) - seeming; exterior; surface; outside; outward appearance
上まわる: (うわまわる) - to exceed (esp. figures: profits, unemployment rate, etc.); to surpass; to be more than; to be better than
上り: (のぼり) - ascent/climbing/ascending (path)/climb; (上り only)  up-train (e.g. going to Tokyo); northward (towards Tokyo)
上りつめる: (のぼりつめる) - to go to the top/to climb to the top/to ascend to the top/to reach the summit (e.g. of a mountain); to be engrossed in/to be very enthusiastic about/to be infatuated with
上りリンク: (のぼりリンク) - reverse link; uplink
上り下り: (のぼりおり) - rising and falling; going up and down
上り列車: (のぼりれっしゃ) - up train; trains going toward the capital
上り勾配: (のぼりこうばい) - uphill grade; upgrade
上り口: (のぼりくち) - (esp. 上 for stairs, 登 for mountain) starting point for an ascent (mountain, stairs, etc.); base (of mountain, etc.)
上り端: (あがりばな) - entrance (i.e. of a Japanese house); start of a rise (e.g. in prices)
上り線: (のぼりせん) - up line; in-bound line
上り詰める: (のぼりつめる) - to go to the top/to climb to the top/to ascend to the top/to reach the summit (e.g. of a mountain); to be engrossed in/to be very enthusiastic about/to be infatuated with
上り調子: (のぼりぢょうし) - rise; improvement; uptrend
上る: (のぼる) - to ascend/to go up/to climb; (usu. 昇る) to ascend (as a natural process, e.g. the sun)/to rise; to go to (the capital); to be promoted; to add up to; to advance (in price); to swim up (a river)/to sail up; to come up (on the agenda)
上を下への大騒ぎ: (うえをしたへのおおさわぎ) - to be in a state of confusion
上を行く: (うえをいく) - to be ahead of
上一: (かみいち) - conjugation (inflection, declension) of ichidan verbs ending in "iru"
上一段: (かみいちだん) - conjugation (inflection, declension) of ichidan verbs ending in "iru"
上一段活用: (かみいちだんかつよう) - conjugation (inflection, declension) of ichidan verbs ending in "iru"
上三角行列: (うえさんかくぎょうれつ) - upper triangular matrix
上上: (じょうじょう) - the best; great; superb
上下: (かみしも) - samurai costume/old ceremonial costume; (上下 only) (orig. meaning) top and bottom/up and down/high and low/above and below/upper and lower ends
上下さかさま: (じょうげさかさま) - upside down
上下になる: (うえしたになる) - to be upside-down
上下動: (じょうげどう) - vertical motion (in earthquakes)
上下左右: (じょうげさゆう) - (yoji) up and down (top and bottom), left and right
上下水道: (じょうげすいどう) - water and sewer services
上下線: (じょうげせん) - both (railway) tracks; (both) up and down tracks (lines)
上下逆さま: (じょうげさかさま) - upside down
上下逆様: (じょうげさかさま) - upside down
上下関係: (じょうげかんけい) - (yoji) pecking order; hierarchical relationship; vertical relationship; hyponymy
上不見桜: (ウワミズザクラ) - Japanese bird cherry (Prunus grayana); Gray's bird cherry; Gray's chokecherry
上中下: (じょうちゅうげ) - excellent-good-poor/first-second-third (class); (in) three volumes (a literary work)
上乗: (じょうじょう) - the best; great; superb
上二段活用: (かみにだんかつよう) - conjugation (inflection, declension) of nidan verbs (resulting in a stem of either "i" or "u" for every conjugation)
上京: (じょうきょう) - proceeding to the capital (Tokyo)
上付く: (うわつく) - to be fickle; to be frivolous; to be flippant; to be flighty; to be giddy; to be restless
上代: (うわだい) - ancient times; (nominal) retail price
上代語: (じょうだいご) - ancient language/ancient word; ancient Japanese language/Japanese as spoken from the end of the 6th century to the end of the Nara period
上伸: (じょうしん) - rise in market prices
上位: (joui) - superior (in rank), top, ranking; higher order (por exemplo, byte) , superior (in rank), top, ranking; higher order (e.g. byte); host computer (of connected device)
上位ダイアログ: (じょういダイアログ) - superior dialogue
上位互換性: (じょういごかんせい) - backward compatibility; downward compatibility
上位五番: (じょういごばん) - {sumo} last five matches of makushita division wrestlers
上位参照: (じょういさんしょう) - superior reference
上位四校: (じょういしこう) - schools of the upper quartile; highly ranked schools
上位層: (じょういそう) - upper level; upper layer
上位概念: (じょういがいねん) - high level concept; superordinate concept; broader term
上位構造: (じょういこうぞう) - higher structure
上位省略表記: (じょういしょうりゃくひょうき) - truncated representation
上位試験手段: (じょういしけんしゅだん) - upper tester
上体をおこす: (じょうたいをおこす) - to straighten up; to sit upright
上体を起こす: (じょうたいをおこす) - to straighten up; to sit upright
上円下方墳: (じょうえんかほうふん) - burial mound with square flat base and round top
上冬: (じょうとう) - tenth month of the lunar calendar
上分別: (じょうふんべつ) - good idea; wise policy
上刻: (じょうこく) - first third of a two-hour period
